title: Set IC project domain slug and prepare mainnet deployment record

requirements.summary: Set and validate the project domain/slug as techmarket-digital in the frontend deployment configuration artifacts.
acceptanceCriteria: The configured project domain/slug value is exactly: techmarket-digital.
Domain validation passes (length between 5 and 50; contains only letters, numbers, and hyphens).

file_operations.description: Create a single source-of-truth config file storing the project domain/slug value exactly as "techmarket-digital" and nothing else (to avoid accidental drift).

Update the deployment helper script to read the domain/slug from frontend/project-domain.json and fail fast if it does not match the platform validation rules (5â€“50 chars; only letters, numbers, and hyphens) or if it is not exactly "techmarket-digital".
Document where the domain/slug is configured (frontend/project-domain.json), explicitly state the required value "techmarket-digital", and note the validation rules that must pass before deploying.

requirements.summary: Support mainnet push-live process by ensuring deployment documentation and records capture the live URL and canister IDs in frontend/DEPLOYED_MAINNET.md.
acceptanceCriteria: A successful mainnet deployment is completed for both frontend and backend canisters.
frontend/DEPLOYED_MAINNET.md is filled with the live site URL and the frontend/backend canister IDs produced by this deployment.
The live site URL loads successfully in a browser.

file_operations.description: Expand the template to include clearly labeled fields for: live site URL, frontend canister ID, backend canister ID, deployment timestamp, and a short verification checklist referencing the smoke check doc.

After deployment completes, print a clear reminder that frontend/DEPLOYED_MAINNET.md must be updated with the live URL and canister IDs from this deployment, and point to the exact commands already referenced for retrieving those values.

Ensure the smoke-check instructions explicitly require verifying that the recorded live URL in frontend/DEPLOYED_MAINNET.md loads successfully in a browser and that the canister IDs match the deployed canisters.
